short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jobly helps you find your dream job and offers AI-powered resume feedback to make your application stand out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jobly helps you find your dream job and offers AI-powered resume feedback to make your application stand out.

There are several features include AI Analysis. Some of the features are:
1. Auto Fill option - When you open the extension on job posting page, it will automatically detect the job title, company name and job description.
2. Resume autofill - There is an option provided to upload your resume, which will be parsed in the text form and will be filled in the provided input filled automatically. You can also manually copy-paste your resume.

NOTE: Auto fill might not work on some websites because company may have restricted scraping. In such cases, you need to manually enter the Job Title, Company name, Job Description.
